metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16116 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In kerfuffle/jobs.cpp in KDE Ark before 20.08.0, a crafted archive can install files outside the extraction directory via ../ directory traversal. Dominik Penner discovered that Ark did not properly sanitize zip archive files before performing extraction. An attacker could use this to construct a malicious zip archive that, when opened, would create files outside the extraction directory.

criterions.comment: ark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:20.04.3-1').
